title: Mahina (mythology)
extract:
In Hawaiian mythology, Mahina is a lunar deity, mother of Hema. Mahina is also the word for Moon in Hawaiian.

It is likely that she is the same as the goddess Hina or Lona.

See also

  • Mahina, French Polynesia
  • Hina
  • Aikanaka, possibly Mahina's husband
